value_labels: [1] Yes; [2] No - transferred from another hospital (via ED); [3] No - in-patient fall; [4] No - transferred from another hospital (direct to ward)

value_labels: [1] Given within 30 minutes of ED presentation; [2] Given more than 30 minutes after ED presentation; [3] Not required – already provided by paramedics; [4] Not required – no pain documented on assessment

value_labels: [1] No; [2] Yes

value_labels: [1] Not assessed; [2] Assessed and normal; [3] Assessed and abnormal or impaired

value_labels: [1] Normal cognition; [2] Impaired cognition or known dementia

value_labels: [1] Not assessed; [2] Assessed and not identified; [3] Assessed and identified

value_labels: [1] No assessment conducted; [2] Geriatrician / Geriatric Team; [3] Physician / Physician Team; [4] GP; [5] Specialist nurse

label: ASA Grade
value_labels: [1] Healthy individual with no systemic disease; [2] Mild systemic disease not limiting activity; [3] Severe systemic disease that limits activity but is not incapacitating; [4] Incapacitating systemic disease which is constantly life threatening; [5] Moribund not expected to survive 24 hours with or without surgery

label: Clinical Frailty Scale
value_labels: [1] Very Fit; [2] Well; [3] Well, with treated comorbid disease; [4] Vulnerable; [5] Mildly frail; [6] Moderately frail; [7] Severely frail; [8] Very severely frail; [9] Terminally ill; [10] Frailty assessment using other validated tool

value_labels: [1] No delay, surgery completed <48 hours; [2] Delay due to patient deemed medically unfit; [3] Delay due to issues with anticoagulation; [4] Delay due to theatre availability; [5] Delay due to surgeon availability; [6] Delay due to delayed diagnosis of hip fracture; [7] Other type of delay (state reason)

value_labels: [1] General anaesthesia; [2] Spinal anaesthesia; [3] General and spinal anaesthesia; [4] Spinal / regional anaesthesia; [5] 6 General and spinal/regional anaesthesia; [6] Other
